title: Memoirs of the Entomological Society of Canada
additional-notes: This is a Canadian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This monographic series was published as a supplement to The Canadian Entomologist.  Copyright checks for an issue should also search on the distinct title of the issue, since it may have been renewed under that title as a book.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Paul Ryersbach for copyright research on this title.
